EmailTemplate.subject: Now Available — Inventory syncing with Square
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re excited to announce our improved integration with Square that syncs inventory between your online and offline stores. Sync your online and in-store inventory See how easy Square makes inventory syncing Learn more <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/bigcommerce-and-square-launch-inventory-sync/]]> Inventory syncing with Square is now available We’re excited to announce our improved integration with Square that syncs inventory between your online and offline stores. Connect BigCommerce and Square to:
- Launch quickly — save hundreds of hours by automatically pushing your BigCommerce product catalog into Square Dashboard - Manually adjust stock levels — all changes are automatically reflected in your online store and Square Dashboard - Avoid overselling — inventory instantly syncs across all channels when orders are placed Setting up Square is easy:
- Visit Settings > Point of Sale
- Click “Connect” and log in or create an account
- Click Import/Export to start automatically syncing your BigCommerce products with Square
<[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pOaLt4_kPTA]]> Set up Square <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
